I used my tortoisecvs to retrieve an older version of a java file
- refresh to get it into eclipse

Created an attachment (id=41105)
cannotOpenJavaFile.png

as per the attached, it is not possible to open the file   :(

and the error message doesn't really help me to resolve the problem...

Looks like a problem in org.testng.eclipse.launch.AbstractTestNGLaunchDelegate.update, which is an external plugin. You might want to file this bug against them.
Sorry, overlooked those two lines, let's see how they progress on this: http://jira.opensymphony.com/browse/TESTNG-70
